name: KAPAY Demo
description:
Adventure with Survival Horror elements
Stylized graphics

Demo version

Hero was drunk all night, fell asleep for a short time, the alarm clock rang, it is necessary to prepare for work ...

Demo is made on Unreal Engine 5

The default is ultra graphics settings with global rayTracing, you can not change the settings, this is the limitation of the demo.

When loading the game from saves, some bugs are possible

The translation into English was done with the help of neural networks, so there may be translation inaccuracies
